author: Jan Van Belle
comment: After 2 days I get the message that my country or language is not supported. How come it worked at first?

author: Alaa Hage
comment: Error message lqnguage or country not supported  what a mesd

Dutch language is not supported! I got an error message every time when my default language off the phone is in dutch... English UK works fine.... Please fix this a soon as possible... I read other reviews to and i'm not the only one who has this problem...
title: Language not supported

author: Stijn Vanloot
comment: Works on my wife's Iphone but not on my Xiaomi MI3... It says country or language not supported, however both phones are in Dutch??

author: Johan Awouters
comment: Please display the time when idle or make it an option. All other models and brands show the time and it was a habit to check the time on the display.
title: Time please!

author: laurent scholtus
comment: It would be nice if the app could allow to control more than one thermostat!

author: Nezha Fennouh
comment: Appp doesn't work. Worse, no response from Junkers... neihter here nor by email, phone or any medium. Cannot download essential data at this time... since weeks. Now finally they added an update: "Your country or language are not supported".... What exactly is not supported!? Belgium? English?? If you sell your devices in Belgium then the apps that go with the devices should work!  FIX IT!

author: MarcOcraM
comment: "New languages were added" ok that's nice,  but then still error msg: "Country or language not supported".  What? The Os of the phone is set to English but I am in Belgium,  give me Dutch,  French,  German, Arab or Swahili,  I don't care,  but let me use my thermostat! I thought it was a Bosch product,  Junkers the best in the market, not some chinese ultracheap crap! Shameful really! Get your product release process fixed guys!!!!

author: koot klep
comment: Error message app doesnt work so now I have a problem heating my house    ...... essential app please btest it profoundly and do not mess it up
title: You cannot download essential data

author: Gregory Denturck
comment: "Cannot download essential data at this time "... the app / service will have to do better to earn more stars. First impression: mitigated.

author: Laia Perez Simbor
comment: "Cannot download...." I simply cannot use it!!!!
title: Bad!

comment: Great! You can control your boiler with your phone inside or outside home. You only need wifi.
